project.title: Doez
project.aim: This website helps employees to keep track of all the clients and employees working on various projects. It gives functionality to create project with necessary details and assign the job role of employees in a project. It is necessary to keep track of employees in an organisation for better performance and efficient product.

overView.title: Resource Details with list of project he/she is allocated
Editing of project details with dynamic search of resources

details.title: Features
points: In an organisation it is very crucial to keep track of resources during development process

It helps to work efficiently. I think that a web application like doez is very beneficial for people to supervise all the project details and resource within the organisation. The dynamic aspect of the system helps to support the future needs in an organisation. It also provides ease way for resources to client information for communication purpose
The design of the system is simple and elegant which helps the user to perform its task without any difficulties

nextProject.title: Cinema Paradise
nextProject.aim: This project aim is to give rating to movies through user reviews from IMDB reviews and google reviews.It uses web scraping , ReactJs as frontend and express as backend.

details.title: Features
points: Able to See list of Movie details about cast, synopsis, images for movie, trailer.
Search movie based on name and category.
Login and rate movies you watch and mark watch later.
Website performs analysis and rate movies based on reviews.
